text: The Acura Integra is a Compact luxury car made by Acura a luxury brand of Honda since 2022 it replaced the Acura ILX. == History and Features == The Acura Integra was revealed in 2022 as a 2023 model its a entry-level car. the design was done in Japan the nameplate was previously used on on a car made by Honda until 2006 and the name is also used on the current gen of the Honda Civic in China also the Integra is based on the current Gen of the Honda Civic. The car has a 1.5 liter turbocharged petrol engine from the Civic Si and a CVT or a 6-speed manual gearbox. a sportier version called the Acura Integra Type S was debuted in 2023 this version shares many of its parts with the Honda Civic Type R it has a 2.0 liter turbo petrol engine and a 6-speed manual gearbox. == Markets == The Acura Integra is sold mainly in the North American market. == References == Category:Acura automobiles Category:Sedans Category:2020s automobiles
title: Acura Integra (2022)
